extends java.lang.Object

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Decoder(Context context)
      The Constructor initializes the fileContext with passed context.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Story decodeStory(Story story, int mode)
      This function decodes a story's images files from encoded strings to byteArray and save them to local before passing the story to addOfflineStory(Story story) for adding to local

    • Constructor Detail

      • Decoder

        public Decoder(Context context)
        The Constructor initializes the fileContext with passed context. The fileContext is used to differentiate between the directories of downloaded stories and an author's stories
        Parameters:
        context - a Context object

    • Method Detail

      • decodeStory

        public Story decodeStory(Story story,
                int mode)
                  throws java.lang.Exception,
                         java.io.IOException
        This function decodes a story's images files from encoded strings to byteArray and save them to local before passing the story to addOfflineStory(Story story) for adding to local
        Parameters:
        story - a story downdloaed from webserver that needs to be decoded
        mode - the mode:
        Returns:
        story the decoded Story
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception
        java.io.IOException
